data.event: Cookville Volunteer Fire Department hosts 19th annual fundraiser Saturday.

event.title: will host its 19th annual fundraiser Saturday, March 28

data.event: The Cookville Volunteer Fire Department will host its 19th annual fundraiser Saturday, March 28, from 12 p.m. to 8 p.m. at the fire station in Cookville, located on County Road 4045, behind the Cookville store.
"We know not everyone can afford to donate right now, but we want to welcome everyone to come out and visit with us and enjoy some good food and fun," McCollum said.
